Headline: Update: No trains between 69th and 95th
ShortDescription: Update: Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between 69th and 95th due to a fire near the tracks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line service has been temporarily suspended between 69th and 95th due to a fire near the tracks.

As a result, trains are operating only between Howard and 69th at this time.

Shuttle buses are available to provide connecting service between 69th and 95th. 

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.  These may include the #29 State bus. 

See station personnel for further assistance, and pay attention to announcements on trains and at stations for service information.

We are working to restore service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop-bound Purple Express Line Experiencing Delays; Boarding change at Belmont
ShortDescription: Loop-bound Purple Express Line service running w/delays; board 95th-bound Red or Loop-bound Brown Line trains at Belmont for continuing service to the Loop.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop-bound Purple Express Line service is running with delays.

Board 95th-bound Red or Loop-bound Brown Line trains at Belmont for continuing service to the Loop.

We're working to restore normal service as quickly as possible. Allow extra travel time.
